level1.question: A shopkeeper sold a product for $200 making a profit of 25%. What was the cost price?
If the cost price of 15 articles is equal to the selling price of 10 articles, what is the profit percentage?
If a man purchases 11 items for $10 and sells 10 items for $11, what is his gain percentage?
A trader sells his goods at a 20% profit. If he bought it for $500, what is the selling price?
If the selling price is $250 and the cost price is $200, what is the profit percentage?
A man buys a book for $200 and sells it for $240. His gain is:
If the cost price is more than the selling price, there is a loss. True or False?
Is a 25% profit on $200 equal to $50?
If the cost price of an article is $300 and the selling price is $330, what is the profit percentage?
If an item is sold for $540 at a profit of 20%, what was its cost price?
A shopkeeper sells a product for $1200 with a 25% profit. What was the cost price?
What is the loss if an item costing $600 is sold for $500?
A man sells an article at a loss of 10%. If the cost price is $500, what is the selling price?
If a man sells two articles for $500 each, one at a gain of 20% and the other at a loss of 20%, then does he make a profit or loss?
A trader buys an article for $800 and sells it at a loss of 15%. What is the selling price?
If an article is sold for $450 at a loss of 10%, what was its cost price?
A man sells a product for $600, gaining 20%. What was the cost price?
A shopkeeper buys 80 articles for $2400 and sells them at $40 each. What is his profit percentage?
A trader marks his goods at 40% above the cost price and gives a discount of 10%. What is his profit percentage?
If a man buys an article for $400 and sells it for $460, what is his profit percentage?
If an article is sold at 10% profit for $220, what is the cost price?
What is the profit if an item costing $1500 is sold for $1800?
A man sells an article at a profit of 25%. If he sells it for $500, what was the cost price?
If an article is bought for $120 and sold for $150, what is the profit percentage?
A trader buys goods at 10% discount on the marked price and sells them at 5% above the marked price. What is his profit percentage?
